components.name: 1-ethyl-3-methylimidazolium ethyl sulfate
sample: 99 mass %(chemical reagent treatment;dried by vacuum heating)

ref.full: Gonzalez, B.; Calvar, N.; Gonzalez, E.; Dominguez, A. (2008) J. Chem. Eng. Data 53(3), 881-887.
ref.title: Density and Viscosity Experimental Data of the Ternary Mixtures 1-Propanol or 2-Propanol + Water + 1-Ethyl-3-methylimidazolium Ethylsulfate. Correlation and Prediction of Physical Properties of the Ternary Systems
